page.title: 10BIGGLESWADE. EDUCATION PLUS
page.content:
At 13+ years, most children in the area transfer to Stratton Upper school in Biggleswade, a large comprehensive school which was the former area Grammar school. It caters for some 1,000 pupils & prepares them for public examinations etc. at 16+ years. There is a large VIth form where 16-18 year old pupils can undertake further studies of a vocational or academic nature before leaving to go to work, university, college, etc.
There are 2 specialist schools in Biggleswade: Hitchmead school takes pupils of all ages with learning difficulties who require specialist education, & Sunnyside Special school caters for more severely handicapped children.
